name: Numbers Go On a Silly Adventure
name_original: Numbers Go On a Silly Adventure
description:
Numbers Go On a Silly Adventure

This game is about some numbers who are all good friends who go way back and they go on a VERY silly adventure, full of ups and downs. This game is NOT for the faint of heart, only silly/fun loving guys and gals can play this game.

Controls:

INTERACT - ENTER

RUN - SHIFT

MOVE - ARROW KEYS
